titleStmt.title: His Majesties chief commissioners and governours of his revenue in this Kingdom, having informed us, that several branches of the said revenue are likely to become much impaired by the negligence or connivance of several justices of the peace, and other magistrates, and the great discouragement and obstruction given by some of them to His Majesties officers and their deputies, in the improvement and collection of the revenue arising as well by hearths ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 11 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the 22d day of August, 1684"--p. [2]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
